article_title: Bidding War to Determine RadioShack’s Fate
article_text:
RadioShack’s fate is still up in the air after a leading lender joined forces with liquidators to launch a bidding war with Standard General, the hedge fund promising to save nearly half the business.

The move by Salus Capital Partners signals the decision on whether RadioShack survives bankruptcy or falls to the liquidators may be made in a Delaware bankruptcy courtroom, rather than at the auction that continues Wednesday in New...
